text: Robert "Speedy" Neal (born August 26, 1962) is an American former professional football running back who played in National Football League (NFL) for the Buffalo Bills in 1984. Neal appeared in a total of 12 career games (2 starts). ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:People from Key West, Florida Category:Players of American football from Florida Category:American football running backs Category:Miami Hurricanes football players Category:Buffalo Bills players
title: Speedy Neal
